overview:
Jean-Michel joined 3i-MIND in 2010. Jean Michel is a senior-level finance executive with 17+ years international experience partnering with various senior management teams at Reuters (Information Agency) at local, regional and global levels . He has recently managed the finance function of the largest global Reuters Software and Professional Services division and he was also Finance and Managing Director of a French Reuters subsidiary (SW development centre).

Prior to that, Jean Michel was Head of Financial Planning & Analysis for Reuters EMEA operations. Jean-Michel has developed extensive experiences and competencies in financial management, analysis, performance optimization, strategic business planning and change management for various business units and geographical zones (Global Sales & Services, Consulting, Desktop and SW divisions, EMEA, Benelux)
